content.summary: EduPulse is a high-fidelity e-learning ecosystem designed to provide personalized, interactive, and verifiable education at scale. It bridges the gap between expert knowledge and learner needs through AI-driven paths and robust instructor tools.
content.description: The EduPulse platform is built on a microservices architecture to support a global audience. Its vision is to become the primary destination for professional upskilling by offering a seamless transition from content consumption to certified mastery. Key differentiators include an interactive video player, AI-curated learning paths, and a high-performance instructor suite. The platform prioritizes accessibility, security, and low-latency content delivery to ensure an elite user experience.

user_stories.title: User Onboarding and Profile Setup
user_stories.story: As a new learner, I want to create an account and set my learning preferences so that the platform can recommend relevant courses to me.
user_stories.description: A seamless registration process supporting OAuth2 (Google, LinkedIn) and a preference wizard to capture interests, skill levels, and career goals.
acceptance_criteria: User can register via email or social login.
Preference wizard includes at least 5 categories of interest.
Profile page allows uploading a photo and editing bio.
System sends a verification email upon registration.
user_stories.user_value: Enables personalized discovery and identity management.

user_stories.title: Advanced Course Search and Filtering
user_stories.story: As a learner, I want to search for courses by keywords, categories, and ratings so that I can find the most suitable content quickly.
user_stories.description: A robust search engine utilizing Elasticsearch to provide real-time suggestions and multi-faceted filtering (price, duration, level, language).
acceptance_criteria: Search results return in under 500ms.
Filters update dynamically based on the result set.
Search supports partial matches and synonyms.
Users can save searches for future notifications.
user_stories.user_value: Reduces friction in finding educational content.

user_stories.title: Interactive Video Learning Interface
user_stories.story: As a learner, I want to watch course videos with interactive transcripts and note-taking capabilities so that I can engage deeply with the material.
user_stories.description: A custom video player supporting HLS streaming, synchronized transcripts, and a sidebar for timestamped personal notes.
acceptance_criteria: Video player supports 0.5x to 2.0x playback speed.
Transcripts highlight the current spoken sentence.
Notes are automatically saved and linked to the video timestamp.
Player supports picture-in-picture mode.
user_stories.user_value: Enhances the core learning experience and knowledge retention.

user_stories.title: Instructor Course Builder
user_stories.story: As an instructor, I want to upload videos, create quizzes, and organize modules so that I can publish a comprehensive course.
user_stories.description: A drag-and-drop curriculum builder for instructors to manage content hierarchy, upload assets to S3, and define passing grades for quizzes.
acceptance_criteria: Instructors can drag and drop lessons to reorder them.
Supports bulk video upload with progress tracking.
Quiz builder supports multiple choice and true/false questions.
Draft mode allows saving progress without publishing.
user_stories.user_value: Empowers content creators to build high-quality educational products.

user_stories.title: Automated Certification Engine
user_stories.story: As a learner, I want to receive a verifiable certificate upon course completion so that I can share my achievement on professional networks.
user_stories.description: A system that triggers certificate generation (PDF) once all course requirements are met, including a unique verification URL or QR code.
acceptance_criteria: Certificates are generated within 60 seconds of completion.
PDF includes learner name, course title, date, and unique ID.
One-click sharing to LinkedIn Featured section.
Public verification page exists for each certificate.
user_stories.user_value: Provides tangible proof of skill acquisition for career growth.

user_stories.title: AI-Driven Learning Path Recommendations
user_stories.story: As a learner, I want the system to suggest my next course based on my previous completions and career goals so that I have a clear roadmap.
user_stories.description: A machine learning model that analyzes user behavior and market trends to suggest 'Learning Paths' rather than just individual courses.
acceptance_criteria: Recommendations update after every course completion.
System explains 'Why' a course was recommended.
Users can dismiss irrelevant recommendations to tune the model.
Supports 'Career Track' bundles (e.g., Full Stack Dev path).
user_stories.user_value: Provides strategic guidance and increases platform stickiness.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: The platform must achieve a Lighthouse accessibility score of 90 or higher.
acceptance_criteria.description: Ensures compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards for inclusive learning.
acceptance_criteria.title: Accessibility Compliance

acceptance_criteria.criteria: All video content must be delivered via a Content Delivery Network (CDN).
acceptance_criteria.description: Minimizes latency and buffering for global users.
acceptance_criteria.title: Global Performance

acceptance_criteria.criteria: The system must support concurrent users up to 50,000 without performance degradation.
acceptance_criteria.description: Ensures scalability during peak hours or marketing campaigns.
acceptance_criteria.title: System Scalability

acceptance_criteria.criteria: All user data must be encrypted at rest and in transit using AES-256 and TLS 1.3.
acceptance_criteria.description: Protects sensitive user information and payment data.
acceptance_criteria.title: Data Security

acceptance_criteria.criteria: The UI must be fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.
acceptance_criteria.description: Provides a consistent experience regardless of the device used.
acceptance_criteria.title: Responsive Design

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Payment processing must support 3D Secure authentication.
acceptance_criteria.description: Reduces fraud and complies with international banking regulations.
acceptance_criteria.title: Secure Payments

acceptance_criteria.criteria: The platform must support offline viewing via a mobile application.
acceptance_criteria.description: Allows learners to continue studying without an active internet connection.
acceptance_criteria.title: Offline Access

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Course ratings must be protected by a verified-purchase algorithm.
acceptance_criteria.description: Prevents review manipulation and ensures trust in the platform.
acceptance_criteria.title: Review Integrity

assumptions: Users have access to a minimum 5Mbps internet connection for standard video streaming.
Instructors will provide content in supported formats (MP4, PDF, etc.).
Third-party payment gateways (Stripe/PayPal) will handle currency conversion.
out_of_scope: Development of proprietary video encoding hardware.

weaknesses: High initial cost of content acquisition
opportunities: Expansion into corporate B2B training markets
Integration with VR/AR for technical skills
threats: Aggressive pricing from established competitors like Udemy

stakeholders.interest: Ease of course creation and fair revenue sharing.
Technical stability, scalability, and clear documentation.
Employee progress tracking and skill gap analysis.

invest_analysis.comments: Standard feature set with clear boundaries.
Complex UI interactions; depends on video hosting infrastructure.
Large scope; may need to be broken down into smaller epics.
Depends on the completion logic of US-3.
High R&D risk; depends on data accumulation from other stories.
